verses.roman:
cūḍā pāñā mahāprabhura ānandita mana
bahu nṛtya-gīta kaila lañā bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: cūḍā pāñā—getting the helmet; mahāprabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ānandita—pleased; mana—the mind; bahu—various kinds; nṛtya-gīta—dancing and chanting; kaila—performed; lañā—with; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees.
translation: When the Deity's helmet fell upon His head, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu became very pleased, and thus He chanted and danced in various ways with His devotees.
